text: The men's 5000 metres event at the 1994 World Junior Championships in Athletics was held in Lisbon, Portugal, at Estádio Universitário de Lisboa on 22 and 24 July. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Daniel Komen ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Habte Jifar ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Giuliano Battocletti ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 24 July {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !! title: 1994 World Junior Championships in Athletics – Men's 5000 metres
